metadata.title: CVE-2023-7192 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: A memory leak problem was found in ctnetlink_create_conntrack innet/netfilter/nf_conntrack_netlink.c in the Linux Kernel. This issue mayallow a local attacker with CAP_NET_ADMIN privileges to cause a denial ofservice (DoS) attack due to a refcount overflow.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
